TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LabelControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Docs.summary: Interacts with the parser to build a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LabelControlBuilder> causes the parser to ignore inner text if it contains only white space characters.

block.para: To create a custom control builder for a derived control, you need to inherit from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies whether white space literals are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
